Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD erred in excluding the applicant based on an Interpol Red Notice
Crimes.Governing_Law: Article 1F(b) of the Refugee Convention, Section 98 of IRPA
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: RPD failed to properly assess credibility of applicant's evidence
Evidence_Type: Testimony from applicant's lawyer and wife
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Reliance on Interpol Red Notice without assessing contradictory evidence
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to consider all relevant evidence and assess credibility
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Testimony that charges were fabricated, evidence of alternative payment method
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Serious reasons for considering a serious non-political crime
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of Interpol Red Notice as conclusive proof
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Alleged prior conviction for fraud based on Interpol Red Notice
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Misrepresentation in border or immigration documents
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant's testimony and supporting affidavits dismissed without proper analysis
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Claim that charges were politically motivated and fabricated
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to assess credibility and conflicting evidence

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD erred in relying solely on an Interpol Red Notice to conclude a serious non-political crime was committed
Crimes.Governing_Law: Article 1F(b) of the Refugee Convention, Section 98 of IRPA
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: RPD failed to adequately assess contradictory evidence of fabrication
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Claims of political motivation and fabrication not properly assessed
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Article 1F(b) excludes individuals who committed serious non-political crimes
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to consider all evidence and provide adequate reasons
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Persecution in Egypt, refugee claim denied due to alleged fraud
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: RPD did not fairly assess applicant's defense
Key_Evidence_Considered: Affidavits from applicant's lawyer and wife
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Charges were fabricated due to political motivations
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Denial of criminal conduct, claim of political persecution

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD erred in excluding the applicant based on an Interpol Red Notice
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: RPD ignored evidence that charges were fabricated
Crimes.Credibility_Factor: Applicant's claim of political motivation not properly evaluated
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Article 1F(b) excludes those with serious non-political crimes
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Claim of persecution, denial based on criminal allegation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Assessment: Lack of fair consideration of defense
Key_Evidence_Considered: Testimony from applicant's lawyer and wife
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Charges were fabricated by the Muslim Brotherhood
Crimes.Defendant_Response: Denial of guilt, claim of political targeting
